newsitem.title: JAPAN: Yaohan shares climb on bargain-hunting.
newsitem.headline: Yaohan shares climb on bargain-hunting.

text.p: Shares in Yaohan Japan Corp jumped on Thursday morning, helped by bargain-hunting after its recent sharp slides, traders said.
The share price of the supermarket chain operator was up 19 yen at 435 yen at 0046 GMT. Volume was 2.12 million shares.

Japan Securities Finance Co Ltd said on Wednesday that it had issued a "warning" that it may run short of shares in Yaohan Japan Corp to lend for margin trade, but that has had little impact on the shares so far, the traders said.
